mdRecord.dcterms:title: U. S. Attorney General Thomas C. Clark's Radio Address at Mount Vernon, February 22, 1948
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of U.S. Attorney General with members of The American Legion giving a radio address from the piazza at Mount Vernon. A typed caption on the reverse reads: (American Legion News Service) - Attorney General Tom C. Clark. Clark led The American Legion's annual observance of the Birthday of George Washington with a nationwide radio address from the piazza of the Washington Home at Mount Vernon. Clark is shown above flanked by the Legion's National Guard of Honor.
